title: Pixel 2 gets very hot and has "Charging connected device via USB" when nothing connected
content:
The problems:
- The phone becomes very hot, even when not connected to a charger
- Doesn't immediately recognize some of the charges, but after going to USB Preferences and choosing "this device" it does charge for any charger.
- Constantly shows notification "Charging connected device via USB" even when nothing is connected.

I tried cleaning the charging port and factory reset, and it didn't help. Moreover, after turning off and on I got database corrupted and had to do factory reset again.

My phone is still under warranty, what should I do?
